content.raw:
I just wrote a little script to sum up the mass, and this change adds about 1.5 kg.
~~~
xmlstarlet sel -t -v '//link/inertial/mass/@value' atlas_simple_shapes.urdf \
  | awk '{ sum += $1 } END { print sum }'
~~~
I get 89.001 before this pull request and 90.5924 after.
content.html:
I just wrote a little script to sum up the mass, and this change adds about 1.5 kg.

xmlstarlet sel -t -v '//link/inertial/mass/@value' atlas_simple_shapes.urdf \
  | awk '{ sum += $1 } END { print sum }'

I get 89.001 before this pull request and 90.5924 after.
